name: Mufid Ghafurzai
story: Abdul-Mussawir Nazari grew up in a small village in Iran. He joined the Iranian army at the age of 18 and quickly realized he had a talent and love for reconnaissance and targeting. After years of service, he decided to seek out new opportunities and joined the OPFOR in their efforts to maintain control in the region. Abdul-Mussawir is highly skilled in his role as a Recon JTAC and is respected among his peers for his attention to detail and dedication to the mission.
